import { Component } from '@angular/core'; @Component({ selector: 'app-homepage', templateUrl: './homepage.component.html', styleUrls: ['./homepage.component.css'] }) export class HomepageComponent { cartItemCount = 0; // Default cart count constructor() {} addToCart() { this.cartItemCount++; // Simulates adding items to the cart } currentBackground: string = 'assets/electromart.webp'; // Default background // Object containing category-specific background images private backgroundImages: { [key: string]: string } = { mobiles: 'assets/cellphone2.jpg', laptops: 'assets/laptopImage3.jpg', headphones: 'assets/headphone2.jpg' }; // Function to change background dynamically changeBackground(category: string) { console.log('Hovered category:', category); // Debugging: check category value if (this.backgroundImages[category]) { this.currentBackground = this.backgroundImages[category]; } else { this.currentBackground = 'assets/default-bg.jpg'; // Fallback to default } } // Function to reset background on mouse leave resetBackground() { this.currentBackground = 'assets/default-bg.jpg'; } }
